Content.Text:
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Perfect, you're here.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, your beloved has come all the way
to see you! Aren't you happy?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm just kidding! No need to look so
disapproving.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you got some time to spare, <MYNAME>?
How about coming for a highly
stimulating date with me?
I have a bad feeling about this
Stimulating...?
I do have a little time
Of course!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
If that's how you feel, fine. I just
wanted to do something nice with you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I know when I'm beat, and I can take my
licks. I'm leaving.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go right away, then. Come on.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me explain. There have been
sightings of a peacock in the area.
<PAGE>
It's a rare bird for this region so it's
kinda lit a fire under my journalist's
soul.
<PAGE>
I thought I'd have you come along and
help me get the scoop on it! What do you
think?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You came along because you thought
this was an actual date? You took that
seriously?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry. I think I've upset you! I guess I
don't understand you as well as I
thought I did, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great, thank you. It's just a little bit
up a head, so let's go.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's meant to be right around here
somewhere...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? What? The time?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, I'm sorry. You really are busy,
aren't you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll finish the story myself, so you can
go on back.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It can't be helped if you don't have
the time. I'd love to have been with you
for a while longer, but that's selfish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Right, need to get back to breaking the
big story!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Glad you're on board. Let's get
out there right away!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? You've spotted it?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, yes! There it is! Just like the
rumors said, look at those colors!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I need to get a picture. Now,
where's my camera!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, that's done it! We scared it off. I
doubt it'll be back here any time soon,
after that.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I got the background on the scoop,
anyway, so now I just need to get home
and write it all up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Thank you for today, <MYNAME>. It was a
lot of fun to have you at my side while
chasing this scoop!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It looks like you had fun, too. I'll
see you back to your house.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
They say lovers who see a peacock
together will be joined in eternal
happiness.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I don't believe in that kind of thing,
normally, but in this case I've
surprised even myself!
